item.title: Yojna Portal Whatsapp Channel 100k Follower
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Yojna Portal - 100K Followers Celebration! Yojna Portal Your trusted source for government schemes and Jobs updates 100,000 Thank You For Your Support! Our Journey Together What started as a simple initiative to provide information about government schemes has now become a community of 100,000 strong members. Thank you for being part of this incredible journey! 100+ Government Schemes Covered 700+ Gif/PNG Banners 100+ Jobs Shared 2000+ total Post Shared Key Milestones 23/10/2023: Launched Yojna Portal WhatsApp Channel 12/07/2024: Reached our first 1,000 family Members 09/08/2024: More Get 5,000 family Members 21/09/2024: 10,000 family Members milestone 19/12/2024: 25,000 family Membersmilestone 28/12/2024: Published Website www.
